details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.4 Colour Spaces - 6.2.4.2 ICCBased colour spaces
details.description: The profile that forms the stream of an ICCBased colour space shall conform to ICC.1:1998-09, ICC.1:2001-12, ICC.1:2003-09 or ISO 15076-1.

rule.description: The profile that forms the stream of an ICCBased colour space shall conform to ICC.1:1998-09, ICC.1:2001-12, ICC.1:2003-09 or ISO 15076-1.
rule.test: (deviceClass == "prtr" || deviceClass == "mntr" || deviceClass == "scnr" || deviceClass == "spac") && (colorSpace == "RGB " || colorSpace == "CMYK" || colorSpace == "GRAY" || colorSpace == "Lab ") && version < 5.0

error.message: The embedded ICC profile (Device Class = %1, color space = %2, version = %3) is either invalid or does not satisfy PDF 1.7 requirements
